shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.

p.codeblock: public abstract int muteLocalVideoStreamEx(boolean muted, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int muteLocalVideoStreamEx(bool mute, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|IRtcEngine") int MuteLocalVideoStreamEx(bool mute, const FRtcConnection& connection);
public abstract int MuteLocalVideoStreamEx(bool mute, RtcConnection connection);
Future<void> muteLocalVideoStreamEx( {required bool mute, required RtcConnection connection});

section.title: Details
section.p: A successful call of this method triggers the callback on the remote client.

ul.li: This method does not affect any ongoing video recording, because it does not disable the camera.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp unity rn electron cs
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
